title: Calories in Tortilla Chips
meta_description: Learn calories in tortilla chips per 100g, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and tips for healthier tweaks to fit your diet.
assumptions: Plain corn tortilla chips, fried in vegetable oil, no added seasonings or dips; standard store-bought variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, frying method, corn type, and portion size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of tortilla chips provides ~499 kcal, with high carbs and fat content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Switch to baked tortilla chips (lower oil content)
Add 1 tbsp salsa per 100g (minimal calorie impact)

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of tortilla chips?
faqs.a: A standard 28g serving (about 10 chips) has ~140 kcal.

faqs.q: Are tortilla chips high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, ~65g carbs per 100g, mostly from corn.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in tortilla chips?
faqs.a: About 25g total fat per 100g, with 3.5g saturated.

faqs.q: How does baking affect calories in tortilla chips?
faqs.a: Baked versions cut calories by 100-150 per 100g due to less oil.
